org.treetank.service.xml.xpath.comparators

Class AbsComparator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.treetank.axis.AbsAxis
      • org.treetank.service.xml.xpath.comparators.AbsComparator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<Long>, Iterator<Long>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GeneralComp, NodeComp, ValueComp

    public abstract class AbsComparator
extends AbsAxis

    AbstractComparator

    Abstract axis that evaluates a comparison.

             AbsAxis mOperand1,

             CompKind mComp)
        Constructor. Initializes the internal state.
        Parameters:
        mRtx - Exclusive (immutable) trx to iterate with.
        mOperand1 - First value of the comparison
        mOperand2 - Second value of the comparison
        mComp - comparison kind

      • compare

        protected abstract boolean compare(AtomicValue[] paramOperandOne,
              AtomicValue[] paramOperandTwo)
                            throws TTXPathException
        Performs the comparison of two atomic values.
        Parameters:
        paramOperandOne - first comparison operand.
        paramOperandTwo - second comparison operand.
        Returns:
        the result of the comparison
        Throws:
        TTXPathException

      • atomize

        protected abstract AtomicValue[] atomize(AbsAxis paramOperand)
                                  throws TTXPathException
        Atomizes an operand according to the rules specified in the XPath specification.
        Parameters:
        paramOperand - the operand that will be atomized.
        Returns:
        the atomized operand. (always an atomic value)
        Throws:
        TTXPathException - if any goes wrong.

      • getType

        protected abstract Type getType(int mKey1,
           int mKey2)
                         throws TTXPathException
        Returns the common comparable type of the two operands, or an error, if the two operands don't have a common type on which a comparison is allowed according to the XPath 2.0 specification.
        Parameters:
        mKey1 - first comparison operand's type key
        mKey2 - second comparison operand's type key
        Returns:
        the type the comparison can be evaluated on
        Throws:
        TTXPathException

      • getCompKind

        public final CompKind getCompKind()
        Getting CompKind for this Comparator.
        Returns:
        comparison kind

      • getComparator

        public static final AbsComparator getComparator(INodeReadTrx paramRtx,
                          AbsAxis paramOperandOne,
                          AbsAxis paramOperandTwo,
                          CompKind paramKind,
                          String paramVal)
        Factory method to implement the comparator.
        Parameters:
        paramRtx - rtx for accessing data
        paramOperandOne - operand one to be compared
        paramOperandTwo - operand two to be compared
        paramKind - kind of comparison
        paramVal - string value to estimate
        Returns:
        AbsComparator the comparator of two axis
